Articles.Content:
* * *
Meet the TUAL I: **T**iny **U**niversal **A**sparagus **L**ander. The standard variant is able to land and return to orbit from \*every airless body.
The 'B' variant can do the same from Laythe, Kerbin, or Duna.

\* Tylo landing is possible, however, it is extremely difficult.

TUAL I Standard Link: [http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2441?download=true](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2441?download=true)

TUAL I 'B' Download Link: [http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2462?download=true](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2462?download=true)

![screenshot2.png](http://s24.postimg.org/9bq4alsbp/screenshot2.png)

![screenshot1.png](http://s3.postimg.org/ls1huohwz/screenshot1.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T02:35:54Z" title="05/18/2015 02:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by Mau**
  
Added 'B' variant of craft.

A Universal Lander... it can land on the universe! O\_O

So I presume this can't actually handle departures from Eve or Kerbin?

It can do Kerbin, though not Eve.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T02:44:37Z" title="05/18/2015 02:44  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by Mau**
